algorithm_technique: Hexadecimal to decimal conversion and rounding
problem_summary_simple: Find the closest shorthand RGB color to a given RGB color.
problem_summary_technical: Converts RGB hex pairs to decimal, rounds them to the nearest multiple of 17 (shorthand step), and converts back to hex.
key_insights: Shorthand RGB colors (#XYZ) correspond to hex values where each pair is a repetition (e.g., #112233).
The step size for shorthand hex values is 17 (0x11), as 0xAA becomes 0x11*A.
Rounding to the nearest multiple of 17 minimizes the squared difference for each color component.
